Fired when a rule is matched with a request when debugging an extension with the "declarativeNetRequestFeedback" permission.

| > | {{WebExtExamples("h2")}} ^ |

Browser compatibility

{{Compat}}

title: declarativeNetRequest
summary: This API enables extensions to specify conditions and actions that describe how network requests should be handled. These declarative rules enable the browser to evaluate and modify network requests without notifying extensions about individual network requests.
